EmailTemplate.subject: Does This Lottery Conundrum Sound Familiar?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: “Standing in a long line of customers playing a large lottery jackpot or waiting on backed-up foodservice will certainly leave a bad impression in the mind of the customer.” – NACS No one likes waiting in lines. Even though they mean a booming business at your Shell station, long queues take a toll on customer satisfaction and loyalty. Not to mention store efficiency. But there’s a single solution that can change that, while offering surprising back office gains: NCR Self-Checkouts for C-Stores. Watch the replay of our self-checkout webinar for c-stores and see how this transformative technology makes your business—and your customer experience—stronger. <[[https://www.ihlservices.com/news/analyst-corner/2020/10/making-seemless-a-reality-for-your-c-store-replay-slides/]]> A recent NCR survey found 75% of consumers are likely to use self-checkout at c-stores. Meanwhile, labor costs increased 7.2% in the past year, according to CS News.
